verses.1: Keimah Paul le Silas le Timoti te in: Pasian le Topa Jesu Khris sungah a om, Thesalonika khua-a om pawlpi mite tungah lai ka hong khak uh hi.
verses.2: Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khris in note tungah dikna le nopsakna thupha hong tungsak tahen.
verses.3: Sanggamte aw, noteʼ upna nakpi takin khang a, note khatlekhat na ki-itna uh lian semsem ahih manin Pasian tungah lungdamna koh ding a kilawm ahih mah bangin, note hangin ama tungah lungdamna ka ko tawntung uh hi.
verses.4: Bawlsiatna le gimna na thuakna khempeuh uh ah na upna uh khahsuah loin thuak zo paisuak na hih manun midangte kiangah Pasianʼ pawlpi ka na kisialh pih uh hi.
verses.5: Tu-a na thuaknate uh hangin Pasianʼ Ukna sungah a om dingin a kilawm mi suak na hih manun Pasianʼ thukhenna a man ahihna hong kilangsak hi.
verses.6: Pasian in a manin na sem ding ahih manin note a hong gimsak mite tungah Pasian in gimna pia dinga,
verses.7: tu-a gimna a thuak note le kote tungah zong nopsakna hong pia ding hi. Vantung panin Topa Jesu le a vanglian a vantung mite, meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin,
verses.8: Pasian a thei lo mite le i Topa Jesu tawh kisai Lungdamna Thu a um lo mite tungah gimna a tungsak ding hi.
verses.9: Ama mite khempeuh le thu um mite khempeuh hangin minthanna le pahtawina a ngah dingin Topa hong pai Ni ciangin a noptuak mahmah Topaʼ minthanna huam sung panin amaute kihawl khia dinga, tawntung suksiatna dan a thuak ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note in kong gen uh thute um na hih manun tua nopna sungah na om ding uh hi.
verses.11: Tua ahih manin ama hong sapna tawh a kilawm a kituak nuntakna na nuntak theih nading uh le ama vangliatna tawh a hoih na hih nop khempeuh uh hih zo-in, na upna uh hangin na khempeuh na zawh theih nadingun Pasian kiangah thu ka hong ngetsak tawntung uh hi.
verses.12: Tua hileh, eiteʼ Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Khris hong hehpihna hangin note in ama tung panin minthanna ngahin, ama min zong a thangsak na hi ding uh hi.
